item.title: Creating Quizzes in Google Form using Google Forms API with Google Apps Script
item.description: Gists This is a sample script for creating quizzes in Google Form using Google Forms API with Google Apps Script. Recently, Google Forms API has been officially published, and it got to be able to be used by users. By this, quizzes in Google Form can be created. Google Form Service (FormApp) can create quizzes. But, unfortunately, in the current stage, the correct answers cannot be added to the quizzes. When Google Forms API is used, this can be achieved.

item.title: Finally, Google Forms API has been officially released as version 1
item.description: Finally, Google Forms API has been officially released as version 1. Create surveys, quizzes, and more using the Google Forms API, now generally available The Google Forms API provides programmatic access for managing Google Forms and acting on responsesâ€” empowering developers to build powerful integrations on top of Forms. Forms API

item.title: Announcing the Google Forms API
item.description: Announcing the Google Forms API Google is proud to announce the Google Forms API! The Forms API is currently available in Restricted Beta, with Open Beta expected to follow in Q4. Forms API
